name: City Messenger
description:
This game was made in 24 hours for the annual IAM Manifest Game Jam.

You are a bike courier delivering important paperwork around the city, but it's rush hour, so watch out!

CONTROLS:

The up [↑] and down [↓] arrow keys move the player.

Space bar throws paperwork to businessmen.

TEAM SQUAD.EXE
